scripts.build: mkdir -p ./build && yarn run build:puml && yarn run build:html
scripts.build:puml: for f in $(find docs -name '*.puml') ; do mkdir -p build/$(dirname $f) && puml generate --svg -o build/${f%.puml}.svg $f ; done
scripts.build:html: for f in $(find docs -name '*.md') ; do mkdir -p build/$(dirname $f) && showdown makehtml -i $f -o build/${f%.md}.html --flavor github -c completeHTMLDocument ; done
